alert.note: Alert for Southern Grafton; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 11:54AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sullivan and southwestern Grafton Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1153 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lebanon, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Claremont, Lebanon, Hanover, Enfield, Newport, Grantham, Lyme, Cornish, Croydon and Plainfield. This includes Interstate 89 near mile marker 45, and between mile markers 48 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
